data.description: Contemporary topics in composite materials, including innovations in sandwich structures, textile composites, and architected materials; fracture mechanics; durability and damage tolerance; experimental techniques; transient, micro, nonlinear, inelastic and environmental effects; advanced manufacturing methods: repair and applications. Knowledge of basic composite materials [such asCIV ENGR/​E M A/​M E  508] is strongly encouraged.
data.title: ADVANCED COMPOSITE MATERIALS
